1371: Bel was born in Scherbier straet in 1371.
1372: Lost mother at the age of 1.
Lost mother at the age of 1.
Vroeden took care of Bel since Bel was 2.
1373: Lost father at the age of 2.
Left Scherbier straet.A.0 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 3.
1388: Bel moved to In den Haeg.B.1 in 1388.
Left orphanage at the age of 18.
1389: Got married to Hersewindis at age 19 in 1389.
Had Hersewindis move in at In den Haeg.B.1 after marriage.
1391: Lost his wife Hersewindis while she was giving birth to Ryccie in 1391.
Got married a second time to Saxiardis at age 21 in 1391.
Had Saxiardis move in at In den Haeg.B.1 after marriage.
1393: Had a son with Saxiardis, Bel, at age 22.
1394: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Wijfgode, at age 23.
1395: Had a son with Saxiardis, Lubertus, at age 24.
1397: Had a son with Saxiardis, Maelkin, at age 26.
1398: Lost his wife Saxiardis while she was giving birth to Ancelmus in 1398.
1399: Lost son Lubertus when Lubertus was 5 years old.
Got married a third time to Wendelmodis at age 29 in 1399.
Had Wendelmodis move in at In den Haeg.B.1 after marriage.
